reviewText:
An exellent Video from a moment in history that never will be forgotten. Daniel Barenboim and the Berlin Filharmonics have not rehersed before the concert - the decision of inviting the guests from DDR was taken on the evening before. You can hear the emotions from the conductor and the conductor. You can feel the presence of the big audience.
Lean back and take it in. Let your thoughts wander, let the memories come.
